pageContent: {"name":"Repulsion Armor Plate","tags":"defense,armor,flat,reduction","description":"Reduce all incoming damage by 5 {+5}. Cannot be reduced below 1.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Mocha","tags":"utility,speed,attack,dual,coffee","description":"Increases attack speed by 7.5% {+7.5%} and movement speed by 7% {+7%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Topaz Brooch","tags":"defense,shield,on,kill","description":"Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health {+15}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Tougher Times","tags":"defense,block,locked","description":"15% {+15%} chance to block incoming damage.\nUnaffected by the luck.","unlock":"Die 5 times."}
{"name":"Trip-Tip Dagger","tags":"offense,dot","description":"10% {+10%} chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Armor-Piercing Rounds","tags":"offense,boss,ammo,bullet,locked","description":"Deal an additional 20% damage {+20%} to bosses.","unlock":"Complete a Teleporter event."}
{"name":"Lens-Maker's Glasses","tags":"offense,critical,chance","description":"Your attacks have a 10% {+10%} chance to \"Critically Strike\", dealing double damage.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Crowbar","tags":"attack","description":"Deal 75% {+75%} damage to enemies above 90% health.","unlock":"Discover 10 unique white items."}

{"name":"Bundle of Fireworks","tags":"offense,on,open,locked","description":"Activating an interactable launches 8 {+4} fireworks that deal 300% base damage.","unlock":"Duplicate the same item 7 times in a row with a 3D printer."}
{"name":"Fresh Meat","tags":"utility,heal,steak,steak,raw,health","description":"Increases maximum health by 25 {+25}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Delicate Watch","tags":"utility,damage,breakable","description":"Increase damage by 20% {+20%}. Taking damage to below 25% health breaks this item.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Roll of Pennies","tags":"utility,damage,gold,scales","description":"Gain 3 {+3} gold on taking damage from an enemy. Scales over time.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Cautious Slug","tags":"defense,heal","description":"Increases base health regeneration by +3 hp/s {+3 hp/s} while outside of combat.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Power Elixir","tags":"utility,heal,low,health","description":"Taking damage to below 25% health consumes this item, healing you for 75% of maximum health.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Paul's Goat Hoof","tags":"defense,movespeed,locked","description":"Increases movement speed by 14% {+14%}.","unlock":"Fail the Shrine of chance 3 times in a row."}
{"name":"Gasoline","tags":"offense,fire,on,kill","description":"Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m {+4m}.\nEnemies burn for 150% {+75%} base damage.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Medkit","tags":"defense,heal,on,hit,locked","description":"2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% {+5%} of maximum health.","unlock":"Defeat an Elite-type monster."}

{"name":"Bustling Fungus","tags":"defense,heal,stand","description":"After standing still for 1 seconds create a zone that heals for 4.5% {+2.25%} of your health every second to all allies within 3m {+1.5m}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Focus Crystal","tags":"offense,close,boost,damage","description":"Increase damage to enemies withing 13m by 20% {+20%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Oddly-shaped Opal","tags":"defense,armor,safe","description":"Increase armor by 100 {+100} while out of danger.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Personal Shield Generator","tags":"defense,shield","description":"Gain a shield equal to 8% {+8%} of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Item Scrap, White","tags":"utility,3d,printer,white","description":"Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Backup Magazine","tags":"utility,charge,locked","description":"Add +1 {+1} charge of your Secondary skill.","unlock":"Fully charge a Teleporter without getting hit."}
{"name":"Energy Drink","tags":"defense,movespeed","description":"Sprint speed is improved by 25% {+25%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Sticky Bomb","tags":"offense,on,hit","description":"5% {+5%} chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Stun Grenade","tags":"offense,stun,on,hit","description":"5% {+5%} chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Soldier's Syringe","tags":"offense,speed","description":"Increase Attack Speed by 15% {+15%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Monster Tooth","tags":"defense,heal,on,kill","description":"Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% {+2%} of maximum health.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Rusted Key","tags":"utility,box,locked","description":"A hidden cache containing an item (80%/20%) will appear in a random location on each stage.\nOpening the cache {consumes} this item.","unlock":"Defeat the Teleporter boss under 15 seconds."}

{"name":"Warbanner","tags":"utility,attack,speed,movespeed,on,level","description":"On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m {+8m}.\nRaise attack and movement speed by 30%.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Predatory Instincts","tags":"offense,critical,locked","description":"Critical Strikes increase attack speed by 12%.\nMaximum cap of 36% {+24%} attack speed.","unlock":"Reach +200% attack speed."}
{"name":"Bandolier","tags":"utility","description":"18% {+10%} chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all cooldowns.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Ghor's Tome","tags":"utility,gold,book,treasure,flesh","description":"4% {+4%} chance on kill to drop a treasure worth 25$. Scales over time.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Ukulele","tags":"offense,on,hit","description":"25% chance to fire a chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage up to 3 {+2} targets within 20m {+2m}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Death Mark","tags":"offense,mark,death,debuff,increased,damage","description":"Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 {+7} seconds.","unlock":""}

{"name":"War Horn","tags":"offense,attack,speed,equipment,locked","description":"Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s {+4s}.","unlock":"Complete 3 Combat Shrines in a single stage."}

{"name":"Fuel Cell","tags":"utility,charge,locked","description":"Hold an additional equipment charge {+1}.\nReduce equipment cooldown by 15% {+15%}.","unlock":"Pickup 5 different types of Equipment."}
{"name":"Old Guillotine","tags":"offense,boss,locked","description":"Instantly kill Elite Monsters below 13% {+13%} health.","unlock":"Defeat 500 Elite Monsters."}
{"name":"Will-O'-the-wisp","tags":"offense,on,kill","description":"On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m {+2.4m} radius for 350% {+280%} base damage.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Hopoo Feather","tags":"utility","description":"Gain +1 {+1} maximum jump count.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Kjaro's Band","tags":"offense,on,hit,locked","description":"Hits that deals more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% {+300%} TOTAL damage over time. Recharge every 10 seconds.","unlock":"Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct."}

{"name":"Shipping Request Form","tags":"utility,item,selector,drop","description":"A delivery containing 2 items (79%/20%/1%) will appear in a random location on each stage. {Increases rarity chances of the items}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Harvester's Scythe","tags":"offense,defense,critical,heal,locked","description":"Gain 5% critical chance.\nCritical strikes heal for 8 {+4} health.","unlock":"Complete a Prismatic Trial."}

{"name":"Runald's Band","tags":"offense,on,hit,locked","description":"Hits that deals more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s {+3s} and dealing 250% {+250%} TOTAL damage. Recharge every 10 seconds.","unlock":"Discover the hidden chamber in the Abandoned Aqueduct."}
{"name":"Infusion","tags":"defense,life,locked","description":"Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 {+1}, up to a maximum of 100 {+100} health.","unlock":"Defeat 3000 enemies."}
{"name":"Wax Quail","tags":"defense,movespeed,pigeon,locked","description":"Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m {+10m}.","unlock":"Reach +300% movespeed (include sprinting)."}
{"name":"AtG Missile Mk. 1","tags":"offense,on,hit","description":"10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% {+300%} TOTAL damage.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Hunter's Harpoon","tags":"utility,movement,speed,on,kill","description":"Killing an enemy increases movement speed by 125%, fading over 1 {+0.5} seconds.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Old War Stealthkit","tags":"defense,phasing,invincible","description":"Falling below 25% health causes you to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 5s.\nRecharges every 30 seconds {-50%}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Shuriken","tags":"offense,on,attack,ninja","description":"Activation your Primary skill also throws a shuriken that deals 400% {+100%} base damage. You can hold up to 3 {+1} shurikens which all reload over 10 seconds.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Regenerating Scrap","tags":"utility,scrap,rare,shop","description":"Does nothing. Prioritized when used with Uncommon 3D Printers. At the start of each stage, it regenerates.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Item Scrap, Green","tags":"utility,3d,green","description":"Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Leeching Seed","tags":"defense,heal,on,hit","description":"Dealing damage heals you for 1 {+1} health.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Chronobauble","tags":"offense,on,hit","description":"Slow enemies for -60% movement speed for 2s {+2s}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Rose Buckler","tags":"defense,armour,shield","description":"Increase armor by 30 {+30} while sprinting.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Red Whip","tags":"defense,movespeed","description":"Leaving combat boosts movement speed by 30% {+30%}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Squid Polyp","tags":"offense,summon,turret,squid,auto","description":"Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% {+100%} attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.","unlock":"Activate 6 turrets in a single run."}
{"name":"Ignition Tank","tags":"offense,ignite,fire,dot","description":"Ignite effects deal +300% {+300%} more damage over time.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Lepton Daisy","tags":"defense,heal,flower","description":"Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 {+1} times.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Razorwire","tags":"offense,on,hit,radius","description":"Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage.\nHits up to 5 {+2} targets in a 25m {+10m} radius.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Berzerker's Pauldron","tags":"offense,movespeed,on,kill,locked","description":"Killing 3 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s {+4s}.\nIncreases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.","unlock":"Charge the Teleporter with less than 10% health."}
{"name":"Alien Head","tags":"utility","description":"Reduce skill cooldown by 25% {+25%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Shattering Justice","tags":"offense,armor,break,hammer,hit","description":"After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 {+8} seconds.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Aegis","tags":"utility,heal,defense","description":"Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for up to 50% {+50%} of the amount you healed.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Brilliant Behemoth","tags":"offense,explosion,on,hit","description":"All your attacks explode in a 4m {+1.5m} radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Sentient Meat Hook","tags":"offense,utility,grab,locked","description":"20% {+20%} chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 {+5} enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.","unlock":"Loop back to the first stage."}

{"name":"Defensive Microbots","tags":"defense,projectile,protection,shield","description":"Shoot down 1 {+1} projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.","unlock":""}
{"name":"57 Leaf Clover","tags":"utility,locked","description":"All random effects are rolled +1 {+1} times for a favorable outcome.","unlock":"Complete 20 stages in a single run."}
{"name":"Laser scope","tags":"offence,critical,damage,x2","description":"Critical Strikes deal an additional 100% damage {+100%}","unlock":""}
{"name":"Ceremonial Dagger","tags":"offense,on,kill,tracking,attack","description":"Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% {+150%} base damage.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Spare Drone Parts","tags":"offense,drones,useless","description":"Gain Col. Droneman.
Drones gain +50% {+50%} attack speed and cooldown reduction.
Drones gain 10% chance to fire a missile on hit, dealing 300% TOTAL damage.
Drones gain an automatic chain gun that deals 6x100% damage, bouncing to 2 enemies.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Dio's Best Friend","tags":"utility,bear,death,jojo,revive,res,locked","description":"Upon Death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.","unlock":"Stay alive for 30 consecutive minutes."}

{"name":"H3AD-5T v2","tags":"defense,attack,fall","description":"Increase jump height.\nCreates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with fall distance.\nRecharges in 10 {-50%} seconds.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Happiest Mask","tags":"offense,on,kill","description":"Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s {+30s}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Wake of Vultures","tags":"utility,elite,poe,headhunter","description":"Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s {+5s}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Frost Relic","tags":"offense,on,kill","description":"Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 1200% damage per second and slows enemies by 80% for 1.5s.\nThe storm grows with every kill, increasing it's radius by 2m.\nStacks up to 18m {+12m}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Ben's Raincoat","tags":"defense,debuff,cleanse,tank","description":"Whenever you would receive a debuff, prevent it. Increases maximum health by 100 {+100}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Rejuvenation Rack","tags":"defense,heal,double,locked","description":"Heal +100% {+100%} more.","unlock":"Without healing, reach and complete the 3rd Teleporter event."}

{"name":"Brainstalks","tags":"offense,locked","description":"Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s {+4s} where skills have no cooldowns.","unlock":"Defeat an Elite boss on Monsoon difficulty."}

{"name":"Resonance Disc","tags":"offense,charge,piercing,explode","description":"Killing 4 enemies in 7 seconds charges the Resonance Disc.\nThe disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage {+300%}, piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage {+1000%}.\nReturns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage {+300%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Pocket I.C.B.M","tags":"offense,missile,triple","description":"All missile items and equipments fire an additional 2 missiles. Increase missile damage by 0% {+50%}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"N'kuhana's Opinion","tags":"offense,locked","description":"Store 100% {+100%} of healing as Soul Energy.\nAfter your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.","unlock":"Find the Altar to N'kuhana."}
{"name":"Symbiotic Scorpion","tags":"utility,debuff,stack","description":"100% chance on hit to reduce armor by 2 {+2} permanently.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Interstellar Desk Plant","tags":"heal,defense,on kill","description":"On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds.\nThe plant heals for 10% of maximum health every second to all allies withing 5m {+5m}. Last 10 seconds.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Bottled Chaos","tags":"utility,trigger,equipment,useless","description":"Trigger a random equipment effect 1 {+1} time(s).","unlock":""}
{"name":"Item Scrap, Red","tags":"utility,3d,rare,red","description":"Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Unstable Tesla Coil","tags":"offense,close,locked","description":"Fire out lightning that hits 3 {+2} enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s.\nThe Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.","unlock":"Deal 5000 damage in one shot."}
{"name":"Soulbound Catalyst","tags":"utility,equipment,locked","description":"Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s {+2s}.","unlock":"Discover and activate 8 unique Newt Altars."}
{"name":"Hardlight Afterburner","tags":"utility,charge","description":"Add +2 {+2} charges of your Utility skill.\nReduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Artifact Key","tags":"activation","description":"A stone shard with immense power.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Queen's Gland","tags":"utility,invocation","description":"Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health.\nCan have up to 1 {+1} Guards at a time.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Shatterspleen","tags":"offense,critical hit,bleed,explode,on death","description":"Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% {+400%} damage, plus an additional 15% {+15%} of their maximum health.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Molten Perforator","tags":"offense,magma,on hit","description":"10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% {+300%} damage and igniting all enemies.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Titanic Knurl","tags":"defense,life","description":"Increases maximum health by 40 {+40} and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s {+1.6 hp/s}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Charged Perforator","tags":"offense,lightning,random,new","description":"10% chance on hit to do down a lightning strike, dealing 500% {+500%} damage.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Defense Nucleus","tags":"utility,summon,triangle","description":"Killing elite monsters spawns an Alpha Construct. Limited to 4 {+4}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Genesis Loop","tags":"low,health,nova,explode,recharge,cooldown","description":"Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 seconds {-50%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Planula","tags":"defense,heal,egg,flat,incoming,new","description":"Heal from incoming damage for 15 {+15}","unlock":""}
{"name":"Pearl","tags":"defense,health,maximum","description":"Increases maximum health by 10% {+10%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Empathy Cores","tags":"offense,summon,drone,boost,new","description":"Every 30 seconds, summon two Solus Probes that gain +100% {+100%} damage per ally on your team.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Item Scrap, Yellow","tags":"utility,3d,unique,yellow","description":"Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Irradiant Pearl","tags":"defense,boost,statistics","description":"Increases ALL stats by 10% {+10%}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Mired Urn","tags":"offense,heal,slow,near,proximity","description":"While in combat, the nearest 1 {+1} characters to you within 13m will be \"tethered\" to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing your for 100% of the damage dealt.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Little Disciple","tags":"offense,tracking,sprint,attack","description":"Fire a tracking wisp for 300% {+300%} damage.\nFires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Halcyon Seed","tags":"utility,invocation,boss,summon","description":"Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event.\nIt has 100% {+50%} damage and 100% {+100%} health.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Safer Spaces","tags":"defense,cooldown,block","description":"Block incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds {-10%}.\nCorrupts all Tougher Times.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Needletick","tags":"offense,utility,collapse","description":"10% {+10%} chance to collapse an enemy for 400% base damage.\nCorrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Lost Seer's Lenses","tags":"offense,crit,insta,kill,elite","description":"Your attacks have a 0.5% {+0.5%} chance to instantly kill a non-Boss enemy.\nCorrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Weeping Fungus","tags":"defense,sprint,heal,percent","description":"Heals for 2% {+2%} of your health every second while sprinting.\nCorrupts all Bustling Fungi.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Encrusted Key","tags":"utility,chest,void","description":"A hidden cache containing an item (60%/30%/10%) will appear in a random location on each stage. Opening the cache consumes this item.\nCorrupts all Rusted Key.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Polylute","tags":"offense,lightning,group","description":"25% chance to fire lightning for 60% TOTAL damage up to 3 {+3} times.\nCorrupts all Ukuleles.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Singularity Band","tags":"offense,blackhole,grab,on,hit","description":"Hits that deal more than 400% damage also fire a black hole that draws enemies within 15m into its center.
Lasts 5 seconds before collapsing, dealing 100% {+100%} TOTAL damage.
Recharges every 20 seconds.
Corrupts all Kjaro's Band and Runald's Band.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Lysate Cell","tags":"utility,stack,add,skill","description":"Add +1 {+1} charge of your Special skill.\nCorrupts all Fuel Cells.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Voidsent Flame","tags":"offense,on,hit,burst,damage,zone,great","description":"Upon hitting an enemy at or above 90% health, detonate them in a 12m {+2.4m} radius burst for 260% {+156%} base damage.\nCorrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Plasma Shrimp","tags":"offense,on,attack,missile","description":"Gain a shield equal to 10% of your maximum health. While you have a shield, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals 40% {+50%} TOTAL damage.\nCorrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Tentabauble","tags":"utility,root,on,hit","description":"5% {+5%} chance on hit to root enemies for 1s {+1s}.\nCorrupts all Chronobaubles.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Benthic Bloom","tags":"utility,upgrade,next,tier","description":"Upgrades 3 {+3} randoms items to items of the next higher rarity at the start of each stage.\nCorrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Pluripotent Larva","tags":"utility,on,death,corrupt,consume","description":"Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability, and all of your items that can be corrupted will be.\nCorrupts all Dio's Best Friends.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Newly Hatched Zoea","tags":"offense,summon,void,ally","description":"Every 60 {-50%} seconds, gain a random Void ally. Can have up to 1 {+1} allies at a time.\nCorrupts all Unique Items.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Gesture of the Drowned","tags":"utility,equipment,locked","description":"Reduce equipment cooldown by 50% {+15%}.\nForces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.","unlock":"Kill 20 Hermit Crabs by chasing them off the edge of the map."}

{"name":"Focused Convergence","tags":"utility,teleporter,event,smaller,faster","description":"Teleporters charge 30% {+30%} faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% {-50%} smaller.","unlock":"In 4 consecutive stages, don't leave the teleporter radius until it is fully charged."}

{"name":"Brittle Crown","tags":"utility","description":"30% chance on hit to gain 2 {+2} gold. Scales over time.\nLose gold equal to 100% {+100%} of amount your are hit for OR lose % gold equal to 100% {+100%} of the maximum health % you lost.\nChooses the greater of the two.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Light Flux Pauldron","tags":"utility,skill,cooldown,bad,trade","description":"Decrease skill cooldowns by 50% {+50%}. Decrease attack speed by 50% {+50%}.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Stone Flux Pauldron","tags":"utility,bad,trade","description":"Increase max health by 100% {+100%}. Reduce movement speed by 50% {+50%}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Purity","tags":"utility,cooldown,reduction,bad luck,reroll","description":"All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 {+1} seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 {+1} times for an unfavorable outcome.","unlock":"Beat the game in Monsoon difficulty."}
{"name":"Shaped Glass","tags":"offense,suicide","description":"Increase base damage by 100% {+100%}.\nReduce maximum health by 50% {+50%}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Visions of Heresy","tags":"active,primary,replace,offense,damage,recharge,cooldown,skill,orb","description":"Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze.\nFire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges {+12} that reload after 2 seconds {+2}.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Hook of Heresy","tags":"active,secondary,replace,offense,skill,explode","description":"Replace your Secondary Skill with Slicing Maelstrom.\nCharge up a projectile that deals 175% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 {+3} seconds. Recharges after 5 {+5} seconds.","unlock":"Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run."}

{"name":"Essence of Heresy","tags":"active,special,replace,offense,skill,stack,explode","description":"Replace your Special Skill with Ruin.\nDealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 {+10} seconds. Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stack at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin.\nRecharges after 8 {+8} seconds.","unlock":"Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run."}

{"name":"Egocentrism","tags":"utility,sacrifice,item","description":"Every 3 {-50%} seconds, gain an orbiting bomb that detonates on impact for 360% damage, up to a maximum of 3 {+1} bombs.\nEvery 60 seconds, a random item is converted into this item.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Beads of Fealty","tags":"secret,unlock,zone,no,effect","description":"Seems to do nothing... but...","unlock":"Unlock the new zone from the \"Hidden Realms\" update when you obliterate with this item."}

{"name":"Strides of Heresy","tags":"utility,movement,skill,arm,speed,heal,defense","description":"Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade.\nFade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% {+25%} of your maximum health. Lasts 3 {+3} seconds.","unlock":"Kill 15 boss monsters in a single run."}
{"name":"Defiant Gouge","tags":"offense,summon,shrine,on use","description":"Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby. Scales over time.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Mercurial Rachis","tags":"offense,power,zone,damage","description":"Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m {+50%}, causing them to deal +50% damage.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Eulogy Zero","tags":"utility,convert,chance,lunar","description":"Items have a 5% {+5%} chance to become a Lunar item instead.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Corpsebloom","tags":"defense,heal,dot","description":"Heal +100% {+100%} more.\nAll healing is applied over time.\nCan heal for a maximum of 10% {-50%} of your health per second.","unlock":""}
{"name":"Transcendence","tags":"defense,chaos","description":"Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields.\nGain 50% {+25%} maximum health.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Helfire Tincture","tags":"offense,suicide,fire,equipment,locked","description":"Ignite ALL characters within 8m. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself.\nThe burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":"Kill 15 enemies simultaneously."}
{"name":"Effigy of Grief","tags":"utility,equipment","description":"ALL characters are slowed by 50% and has their armor reduced by 20.\nCan place up to 5.\nCooldown: 15s","unlock":""}

{"name":"Glowing Meteorite","tags":"offense,suicide,equipment,locked","description":"Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast.\nLast 20 seconds.","unlock":"Carry 5 Lunar items in a single run."}

{"name":"Spinel Affliction","tags":"utility,buff,debuff,attack,speed,movespeed,health,regen","description":"Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 15 seconds.
Increases damage by +100%.
Increases attack speed by +70%.
Increases armor by +20.
Increases maximum health by +50%.
Increases passive health regeneration by +300%.
Increases movespeed by +30%.
When the tonic wears off, you have 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% {-5%}","unlock":"Discover and enter three unique portals."}

{"name":"Preon Accumulator","tags":"offense,locked","description":"Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m up to 600% damage/second.\nOn contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.\nCooldown: 140s","unlock":"Open the Timed Security Chest on Rallypoint Delta."}
{"name":"Blackhole","tags":"offense,stack","description":"Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into it's center. Last 10 seconds.\nCooldown: 60s","unlock":""}

{"name":"Trophy Hunter's Tricorn","tags":"utility,one,shoot,boss,drop,item","description":"Execute any enemy capable of spawning a unique reward, and it will drop that item. Equipment is consumed on use.","unlock":""}

{"name":"Blast Shower","tags":"utility,defense,cleanse,debuff","description":"Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.\nCooldown: 20s","unlock":"Die three fiery deaths."}
{"name":"Disposable Missile Launcher","tags":"attack","description":"Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":""}
{"name":"Ocular HUD","tags":"attack","description":"Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.\nCooldown: 60s","unlock":""}

{"name":"Forgive Me Please","tags":"offense,trigger,on kill","description":"Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.\nCooldown: 45","unlock":"Die 20 times."}
{"name":"The Back-up","tags":"utility,locked","description":"Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you.\nLast 25 seconds.\nCooldown: 100s","unlock":"Repair 30 drones or turrets."}

{"name":"Volcania Egg","tags":"utility,offense,detonate,movement","description":"Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact.\nDetonates at the end for 800% damage.\nCooldown: 30s","unlock":""}
{"name":"Foreign Fruit","tags":"defense,heal","description":"Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":""}
{"name":"Jade Elephant","tags":"utility,defense,resistance,armor","description":"Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":""}

{"name":"Eccentric Vase","tags":"utility,scan,locked","description":"Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":"Defeat the guardian of Gilded Coast without any beacons deactivating."}

{"name":"The Crowdfunder","tags":"offense,troll,locked","description":"Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet.\nCosts $1 per bullet. Costs increases over time.\nCooldown: 5s","unlock":"Collect $30,480 total gold."}
{"name":"Goobo Jr.","tags":"utility,clone,summon","description":"Spawn a gummy clone that has 700% damage and 700% health. Expires in 30 seconds.\nCooldown: 100s","unlock":""}
{"name":"Milky Chrisalis","tags":"utility,movespeed","description":"Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds.\nGain +20% movement speed for the duration.\nCooldown: 60s","unlock":""}
{"name":"Super Massive Leech","tags":"defense,heal,leech,on hit","description":"Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.\nCooldown: 60s","unlock":""}

{"name":"Royal Capacitor","tags":"offense,locked","description":"Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.\nCooldown: 20s","unlock":"Defeat the Teleporter bosses after activating 2 Shrines of the Mountain."}

{"name":"Molotov (6-Pack)","tags":"offense,fire","description":"Throw 6 molotov cocktails that ignites enemies for 500% base damage. Each molotov leaves a burning area for 200% damage per second.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":""}

{"name":"Executive Card","tags":"utility,shop,money,gold","description":"Whenever you make a gold purchase, get 10% of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a multishop terminal, the other terminals will remaing open.\nCooldown: 0.1s","unlock":""}

{"name":"Gnarled Woodsprite","tags":"defense,heal,locked","description":"Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals a friendly target for 10% of their maximum health instantly, then 1.5% of your maximum health every second.\nActivating the equipment assigns a new target, or yourself if there are no targets available.\nCooldown: 15s","unlock":"Fully upgrade a Shrine of the Woods."}

{"name":"Recycler","tags":"utility,reroll,recycle,transform","description":"Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted in the same tier one time.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":"Destroy  20 flying rocks in Sky Meadow."}

{"name":"Sawmerang","tags":"offense,boomerang","description":"Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage.
Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies.
Can strike enemies again on the way back.
Cooldown: 45s","unlock":""}
{"name":"Radar Scanner","tags":"utility,scan,locked","description":"Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":"Collect 10 Monster or Environment Logs."}

{"name":"Gorag's Opus","tags":"utility,offense,frenzy,movement speed,attack speed","description":"All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.\nCooldown: 45s","unlock":""}

{"name":"Remote Caffeinator","tags":"utility,heal,drop,coffee,deliver","description":"Request an Eclipse Zero Vending Machine from the UES Safe Travels. Delivery guaranteed in 5 seconds, dealing 2000% damage. Heal up to 3 targets for 25% of their maximum health.\nCooldown: 60s","unlock":""}
